description.zh-cn: 指史料所载宋朝昭宪太后临终时命宋太祖赵匡胤传位于弟赵光义的遗言。该盟约的真实性备受争议，后世学者多认为是宋太宗命赵普伪造，以巩固其统治合法性。
description.en: Refers to the historical account of the last words of Empress Dowager Du of the Song Dynasty, ordering Emperor Taizu (Zhao Kuangyin) to pass the throne to his younger brother, Zhao Guangyi. The authenticity of this pledge is highly debated, with many later scholars believing it was fabricated by Zhao Pu under the order of Emperor Taizong to legitimize his rule.

description.zh-cn: 宋朝太后，宋太祖赵匡胤、宋太宗赵光义、赵廷美的生母。
description.en: Empress Dowager of the Song Dynasty, mother of Emperor Taizu (Zhao Kuangyin), Emperor Taizong (Zhao Guangyi), and Zhao Tingmei.

description.zh-cn: 宋朝开国皇帝。
description.en: Founding emperor of the Song Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 宋朝第二位皇帝，宋太祖赵匡胤之弟。
description.en: The second emperor of the Song Dynasty, younger brother of Emperor Taizu (Zhao Kuangyin).

description.zh-cn: 宋太祖赵匡胤与宋太宗赵光义之弟。
description.en: Younger brother of Emperor Taizu (Zhao Kuangyin) and Emperor Taizong (Zhao Guangyi).

description.zh-cn: 宋朝初年宰相，据称是“金匮之盟”的记录者。
description.en: A chancellor in the early Song Dynasty, who allegedly recorded the 'Pledge of the Golden Casket'.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的一个朝代，由赵匡胤建立。
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history, founded by Zhao Kuangyin.

description.zh-cn: 宋太祖赵匡胤的长子。
description.en: The eldest son of Emperor Taizu of Song, Zhao Kuangyin.

description.zh-cn: 宋太祖赵匡胤的次子。
description.en: The second son of Emperor Taizu of Song, Zhao Kuangyin.

description.zh-cn: 后周最后一位皇帝，年幼即位。
description.en: The last emperor of the Later Zhou dynasty, who ascended the throne at a young age.

description.zh-cn: 五代十国时期的最后一个朝代，宋朝的前身。
description.en: The last dynasty of the Five Dynasties and Ten Kingdoms period, preceding the Song Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 指宋太祖赵匡胤暴毙，宋太宗赵光义即位的历史疑案，暗示赵光义可能弑兄夺位。
description.en: Refers to the historical mystery surrounding the sudden death of Emperor Taizu (Zhao Kuangyin) and the succession of Emperor Taizong (Zhao Guangyi), implying that Zhao Guangyi might have committed fratricide to usurp the throne.

description.zh-cn: 中国学者，认为金匮之盟为虚构。
description.en: A Chinese scholar who believes the 'Pledge of the Golden Casket' was a fabrication.

description.zh-cn: 宋朝官员，曾与赵普有政治斗争。
description.en: An official of the Song Dynasty who was involved in political struggles with Zhao Pu.

description.zh-cn: 据史料记载，昭宪太后在建隆二年（961年）病重时，口授遗命，要求宋太祖赵匡胤将皇位传给其弟，从而形成了“金匮之盟”的核心内容。
description.en: According to historical records, when Empress Dowager Du was critically ill in 961, she dictated her last will, demanding Emperor Taizu (Zhao Kuangyin) to pass the throne to his younger brother, thus forming the core content of the 'Pledge of the Golden Casket'.

description.zh-cn: 据史料记载，昭宪太后在建隆二年（961年）病重时召赵普入宫，命他将自己要求兄终弟及的遗命记录下来，写成誓书，藏于金匮。
description.en: According to historical records, when Empress Dowager Du was critically ill in 961, she summoned Zhao Pu to the palace and ordered him to record her last will, which stipulated the succession from brother to brother, write it down as a pledge, and store it in a golden casket.

description.zh-cn: “金匮之盟”的说法为宋太宗赵光义在其兄宋太祖去世后继承皇位提供了合法性支持。
description.en: The narrative of the 'Pledge of the Golden Casket' provided legitimacy for Emperor Taizong (Zhao Guangyi) to inherit the throne after the death of his brother, Emperor Taizu.

description.zh-cn: 赵匡胤是昭宪太后的儿子。
description.en: Zhao Kuangyin was the son of Empress Dowager Du.

description.zh-cn: 赵光义是昭宪太后的儿子。
description.en: Zhao Guangyi was the son of Empress Dowager Du.

description.zh-cn: 赵廷美是昭宪太后的儿子。
description.en: Zhao Tingmei was the son of Empress Dowager Du.

description.zh-cn: 赵匡胤与赵光义是兄弟关系。
description.en: Zhao Kuangyin and Zhao Guangyi were brothers.

description.zh-cn: 赵光义与赵廷美是兄弟关系。
description.en: Zhao Guangyi and Zhao Tingmei were brothers.

description.zh-cn: 赵德昭是宋太祖赵匡胤的长子。
description.en: Zhao Dezhao was the eldest son of Emperor Taizu, Zhao Kuangyin.

description.zh-cn: 赵德芳是宋太祖赵匡胤的次子。
description.en: Zhao Defang was the second son of Emperor Taizu, Zhao Kuangyin.

description.zh-cn: 太平兴国四年（979年），宋太宗赵光义逼迫其侄赵德昭自刎身亡。
description.en: In 979 (the 4th year of Taiping Xingguo), Emperor Taizong (Zhao Guangyi) forced his nephew Zhao Dezhao to commit suicide.

description.zh-cn: 太平兴国六年（981年），宋太祖次子赵德芳离奇病死，后世多怀疑与宋太宗有关。
description.en: In 981 (the 6th year of Taiping Xingguo), Zhao Defang, the second son of Emperor Taizu, died mysteriously, with later generations widely suspecting Emperor Taizong's involvement.

description.zh-cn: 宋太宗赵光义将自己的弟弟赵廷美流放致死。
description.en: Emperor Taizong (Zhao Guangyi) exiled his own brother, Zhao Tingmei, which led to his death.

description.zh-cn: 昭宪太后认为后周因皇帝年幼而亡国，这一看法促使她提出皇位应由年长君主继承的主张。
description.en: Empress Dowager Du believed that the Later Zhou dynasty fell because its emperor was too young, which prompted her to advocate for the throne to be inherited by an adult ruler.

description.zh-cn: “烛影斧声”这一历史疑案使士大夫普遍怀疑宋太宗赵光义即位的正当性。
description.en: The historical mystery of the 'Shadow of the Candle and the Sound of the Axe' made scholar-officials widely doubt the legitimacy of Emperor Taizong's (Zhao Guangyi) ascension to the throne.

description.zh-cn: 宋太宗因赵普提出的“金匮之盟”解决了其继位合法性问题而心存感激，并重新任命其为宰相。
description.en: Emperor Taizong was grateful to Zhao Pu for resolving the legitimacy issue of his succession with the 'Pledge of the Golden Casket' and reappointed him as chancellor.

description.zh-cn: 学者王立群论证“金匮之盟”为虚构，是赵普和宋太宗为各自政治利益而共同伪造的。
description.en: Scholar Wang Liqun argues that the 'Pledge of the Golden Casket' was a fabrication, jointly created by Zhao Pu and Emperor Taizong for their respective political interests.

description.zh-cn: 根据王立群的观点，卢多逊曾迫害赵普及其家人，是赵普的政敌。
description.en: According to Wang Liqun's view, Lu Duoxun persecuted Zhao Pu and his family, and was his political enemy.
